# Greenfire (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Acid Spells|acid]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], Nentyar hunter 3

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** One 5-ft. cube/level (S)

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half (see text)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Unapproachable East (WotC), pg. 50

You evoke from the earth an upwelling of virulent green energy, burning any creature in the spellâ€™s area for 2d6 points of acid damage plus 1 point per caster level (maximum 2d6 +10). Any creature in the affected area when the spell is cast is entitled to a Reflex save for half damage; any creature that enters the area of the spell while the *greenfire* is still present gets no saving throw.

The *greenfire* does not harm natural vegetation, ground cover, or plant creatures, if you so desire.
